headline: An EPYC trip to Rome: AMD is Cloudflare's 10th-generation Edge server CPU
keywords: Hardware, Cloudflare Network, Data Center, EPYC, Partners, Speed & Reliability
description: As we started looking at production ready systems to power our Gen X solution, we took a long look at what is available to us in the market today and we’ve made our decision. We’re moving on from Gen 9's 48-core setup of dual socket Intel Xeon Platinum 6162's to a 48-core single socket AMD EPYC 7642
